title: Interactive Physical Activity Programs
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to provide interactive physical activity programs tailored to each client's abilities so that I can engage them in safe and effective exercises that improve their physical health.

title: Cognitive Stimulation Games for Clients
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to provide cognitive stimulation games tailored to my clients' abilities so that I can help enhance their cognitive health and keep them engaged.

title: Progress Tracking for Physical Activities
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to track my clients' physical activity progress so that I can monitor their engagement in health-promoting activities and adapt care plans accordingly.

title: Personalized Cognitive Engagement for Clients
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to provide personalized cognitive challenges tailored to each client's abilities so that I can engage them in meaningful activities that promote their mental health and well-being.

title: Feedback Mechanism for Health Engagement
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to provide feedback on my clients' engagement in physical and cognitive activities so that I can encourage them to participate more actively and monitor their progress.

title: Activity Recommendations for Client Engagement
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want ALFRED to recommend personalized activities for my clients based on their interests and cognitive abilities, so that I can help keep them engaged and prevent cognitive decline.

title: Guided Tutorials for New Activities
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want guided tutorials for new activities so that I can efficiently introduce and facilitate engaging physical and cognitive exercises for my clients, ensuring they remain active and stimulated.

title: Adaptive Learning for Activity Adjustments
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want ALFRED to adapt activities based on each client's capabilities so that I can ensure they engage in appropriate exercises that promote their physical and cognitive health effectively.

title: User Progress Reports for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to receive user progress reports for my clients so that I can efficiently track their health status, document care activities, and ensure timely interventions as needed.
